document.full_text: northern ireland's rory mcilroy and graeme mcdowell will meet in the last 16 of the world match play championship after the group stage ended friday with four major winners tumbling out in andalusia.
document.title: mcilroy, mcdowell to meet in world match play
lines_and_colors: northern ireland's rory mcilroy and graeme mcdowell will meet in the last 16 of the world match play championship after the group stage ended friday with four major winners tumbling out in andalusia.
